name: Ghost Catcher
description:
Action ghosty game you are stuck in the place and you need to escape and you only have a book of spells to protect yourself.

left right up down keys to move.

space to open the book of spells to catch the ghosts.

Escape for you life and get the hell put of there to WIN.

Assets:

player from https://www.gameart2d.com/cute-girl-free-sprites.html

tile set from https://tilation.itch.io/

ghost from GDevelop free store.

Proudly developed with GDevelop.
